review: Nothing special to see here.If you want a simple, easy, inexpensive streaming device, then Chromecast is for you. Chromecast allows you to stream from popular sources like Netflix, YouTube, Google Chrome Webpages.The box comes with: 1 Chromcast (looks like a little USB stick), 1 Charging Block, 1 mini USB to USB cord, 1 HDMI extender, great customer servicePros: Easy to use and set up, inexpensive, easily transferrable, good quality on some sitesCons: Not yet compatible with all streaming services (Prime Instant Video, iTune), lag time on browser casts, my first chromecast stopped receiving electrical input... i.e. it broke
